member.name: T:Microsoft.International.Windows.Controls.KoreanAutoCompleteListener
member.summary: Provides a listener with Korean IME-aware autocomplete support of IntelliSence and AutoCompletion mode.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.Windows.Controls.KoreanAutoCompleteListener.Create(System.Windows.Controls.Control,Microsoft.International.Windows.SupportType)
member.summary: Creates a KoreanAutoCompleteListener instance of specified auto-complete mode for the binding control.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.Windows.Controls.KoreanAutoCompleteListener.OnGotFocus(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.param: An EventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.Windows.Controls.KoreanAutoCompleteListener.OnLostKeyboardFocus(System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when an unhandled Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus attached event reaches an element derived from this class. Implements this method to add class handling for this event.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.Windows.Controls.KoreanAutoCompleteListener.OnPreviewMouseDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when an unhandled Mouse.PreviewMouseDown event reaches an element that is derived from this class. Implements this method to add class handling for this event.
member.param: Contains the event data indicating that one or more mouse buttons were pressed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.Windows.Controls.KoreanAutoCompleteListener.OnTextChanged(System.Windows.Controls.TextChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when content in this edit control changes.
member.param: The arguments that are associated with the TextChanged event.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.Windows.Controls.KoreanAutoCompleteListener.SupportType
member.summary: Gets or sets the support type of Auto-Complete.

member.name: T:KoreanAutoCompletionWPF.CommonResource
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:KoreanAutoCompletionWPF.CommonResource.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:KoreanAutoCompletionWPF.CommonResource.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
